2.caption_en: Slide illustrating IT value layers — Ecosystem, Engagement, Intelligence, and Infrastructure — and how they map to user value propositions. It lists enabling capabilities like web portal, app, automated matchmaking, artificial intelligence, sensors, data interfaces, and operating system.

It lists enabling capabilities like web portal, app, automated matchmaking, artificial intelligence, sensors, data interfaces, and operating system.

3.caption_en:
A tall, narrow sky-blue polygon stretches vertically across a light-gray background, tapering to sharp points at both top and bottom. The shape has an inward notch on the left side about midway down, giving it an elongated kite-like appearance.

5.caption_en:
Caption:
A diagram titled "Value Proposition to the users" showing eight user-facing components arranged in two columns: left column — Web Portal, Automated Matchmaking, Artificial Intelligence, Sensors; right column — App, User data validation, Data Interfaces, Operating System.
